title: The vindication of the seperate brethren of the spirit, against a libell, called The resolution of the Rovnd-heads and against all slanderous pamphlets, since the time that Symon Magus tempted Symon the Cobler / published by H. Drewrey.
author: Drewrey, H.
notes: This item appears at reel 250:E.135, no. 25 as Wing D2167, and at reel 299:23 as Wing V531 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
